=A0 Good twist to the story line.

As far as I know Powerlinking belongs to=
 the Energon and Armada styled transformers, and any Autobot or Decepticon =
that is here now in Neo Beast Wars had to be modified at least slightly to =
exist here. So many of the gimicks are gone - for example Scorponk cannot b=
ecome a city sized defence base. I would imagine that that would apply to P=
owerlinking as well?

Preston
